snippet: A number of apps can help in decision making, whether you’re wavering over vacation destinations, a baby’s name or what to order for dinner.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column compares smartphone decision-making apps that help users who are indecisive bring order to their lives; recommends Lumific intelligent photo gallery app, which is available for Android phones.
lead_paragraph: A number of apps can help in decision making, whether you’re wavering over vacation destinations, a baby’s name or what to order for dinner.

headline.print_headline: Aids for the Indecisive, When Options Abound
headline.main: Aids for the Indecisive, When Options Abound
